data.title: TOMORROW X TOGETHER WORLD TOUR <ACT : PROMISE> IN MACAU
data.description:
TOMORROW X TOGETHER - consisting of SOOBIN, YEONJUN, BEOMGYU, TAEHYUN, and HUENINGKAI - established themselves as Gen Z Icons through the compelling soundtrack that represents the common experiences and emotions of today’s generation. The quintet’s 4th Mini Album minisode 2: Thursday’s Child (May 2022 release) debuted at No. 4 on the Billboard 200 and charted for 14 weeks, while 5th Mini Album The Name Chapter: TEMPTATION (January 2023 release) debuted atop the chart. In July 2022, Gen Z’s leading band became the first K-pop group to perform at LOLLAPALOOZA in Chicago and returned a year later in August 2023 to become the first K-pop group to headline the festival. Notably, TOMORROW X TOGETHER have been nominated at prestigious awards, such as the American Music Awards and People’s Choice Awards, and won at the 2022 MTV EMAs (Best Asia Act) and 2023 MTV VMAs (PUSH Performance of the Year). The band released their highly-anticipated 6th Mini Album minisode 3: TOMORROW on April 1, 2024, which hit No. 3 on the Billboard 200, solidifying their position as the second K-pop artist ever to enter 10 albums on the chart.

TOMORROW X TOGETHER 由 SOOBIN、YEONJUN、BEOMGYU、TAEHYUN 和 HUENINGKAI 組成，透過代表當今世代共同的經歷和情感、引人入勝的音樂，確立了自己作為 Z 世代偶像的地位。TXT的第四張迷你專輯《minisode 2: Thursday’s Child》（2022年5月發行）首次亮相就在Billboard 200上排名第四，並在排行榜上停留了14週，而第五張迷你專輯《The Name Chapter: TEMPTATION》（2023年1月發行）首次登上排行榜冠軍。 2022年 7月，作為Z世代的領導樂隊更成為第一個在芝加哥 LOLLAPALOOZA 表演的韓國流行樂隊，並於一年後的2023年8月回歸，成為第一個在該音樂節上亮相的韓國流行樂隊。值得注意的是，TOMORROW X TOGETHER獲得了全美音樂獎和全美民選獎等著名獎項的提名，並榮獲 2022年 MTV EMA（最佳亞洲藝人）和 2023年 MTV VMA（年度表現獎）獎項。2024年4月1日發行了備受期待的第六張迷你專輯《minisode 3: TOMORROW》，在Billboard 200 排行榜上排名第三，鞏固了他們作為第二位進入10張專輯的韓國流行歌手的地位。


Date & Time 時間: 2024/08/30 8PM & 2024/08/31 7PM

Venue 地點: GALAXY ARENA 銀河綜藝舘


MOA MEMBERSHIP PRESALE MOA會員預購

10:00 - 15:00 (CST), July 4th (Thursday)


General Onsale 公開售票

18:00(CST) , July 4th (Thursday)


Ticket Price 門票價格

-HKD/MOP 1,999 VIP L/ R *STANDING (INCLUDE SOUND CHECK PARTY)

-HKD/MOP 1,999 PLATINUM SEATED

-HKD/MOP 1,799 CAT 1 SEATED

-HKD/MOP 1,499 CAT 2 SEATED

-HKD/MOP 1,199 CAT 3 SEATED

-HKD/MOP 799 CAT 4 SEATED

-RESTRICTED VIEW ZONE


SEAT MAP



*You may be unable to see the entire stage from the Restricted view seats.

Restricted View指視線受阻座位，有機會未能看到完整舞台 。

*VIP (STANDING) entry is with queue number. For safety reasons, pregnant women and children under 140 cm or 12 years old are not allowed to enter VIP (STANDING) area.

VIP站區票面有序號，請依票面序號排整隊入場。人身安全起見，孕婦及身高未滿140公分或未滿12歲孩童，請勿購買VIP站區票券，主辦方將有權謝絕入場

*Registration does not guarantee you a ticket. Your MOA MEMBERSHIP NUMBER will be your presale promo code

登記會員並不保證成功購票。您的MOA MEMBERSHIP會員編號即為您的預購碼

*Purchase limit is 4 tickets for MOA MEMBERSHIP per sale (2 tickets per show) and 4 tickets per show per account for Public on sale. If more tickets than the specified limit are purchased using the same member ID after verification, the organizer reserves the right to cancel the ticket transaction.

會員預購每筆ID限購4張票券（每場2張票券），公開售票每人每交易限購4張票券。若經核對發現同一會員ID購票數超出限制數量，主辦單位有權取消該票券交易。

*Tickets purchased from MOA MEMBERSHIP presale are non-transferable.

會員優先購票不支持轉贈

*We do not offer returns or exchanges.

售出門票不設退換
